settings.title: Natural
settings.caption: Wool is a natural product that is shorn annually. It is naturally anti-microbial, wicks moisture, and regulates temperature - keeping you warm in winter and cool in summer.

settings.title: Biodegradable
settings.caption: Wool is organic and completely biodegradable, making it an excellent material for sustainability.

settings.title: Cleansing
settings.caption: Wool purifies the air by removing volatile organic compounds (VOCs) such as formaldehyde in the atmosphere.
